pages.text: The Storm's Edge is said to be forged from a rare metal that is able to channel and harness the power of electricity. The hilt is made of a dark wood and are wrapped in protective leather.

The twinblade has the ability to store electricity, and with a command word or willpower, the wielder can release it to propel themselves forward, quickly closing the distance with their enemies and becoming temporarily invulnerable to all attacks.
